title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Indulge in the flavors of fall with The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas bundle! This delightful package includes 36 tea bags each of Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. 

Savor the warm and comforting taste of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves in the Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea, a caffeine-free blend perfect for cooler autumn days. For a sweet treat, enjoy the Caramel Apple Herbal Tea, featuring the flavors of sweet apples, vanilla, and South African Rooibos.

With easy steeping instructions and the option to compost used tea bags, this bundle is not only delicious but also eco-friendly. Ideal for cozy evenings or as a dessert tea, this Herbal Tea Bundle is a must-have for the harvest season. Don't miss out on this limited-edition fall delight!

Indulge in the cozy flavors of fall with The Republic of Tea Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas bundle! This bundle includes 36 tea bags each of Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. 

The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend that captures the essence of apple cider with hints of cinnamon and cloves. Made with natural ingredients like apple pieces, orange peel, and ginger root, this tea is perfect for chilly autumn days.

On the other hand, the Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a delightful caffeine-free blend of sweet apples, vanilla, and South African Rooibos. Sip on this comforting blend as a dessert tea or a treat any time of day.

With simple steeping instructions and the option to compost used tea bags, this bundle is not only delicious but also eco-friendly. Don't miss out on this limited-edition fall treat - get your hands on The Republic of Tea Fall Apple Teas bundle today!

Indulge in the cozy flavors of fall with The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas bundle. This delightful set includes Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea, each with 36 tea bags for you to enjoy. 

The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend bursting with the flavors of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. On the other hand, the Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a sweet and comforting caffeine-free blend of apples, vanilla, and South African Rooibos.

Simply steep these teas in boiling water for 5-7 minutes and savor the warm and inviting aromas that will fill your home. Perfect for the harvest season or as a delicious dessert tea, this bundle is a must-have for tea lovers looking to add a touch of autumn to their tea collection. Don't forget, you can even compost or recycle the used tea bags for an eco-friendly touch. Order your Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas bundle today and elevate your tea-drinking experience!
